subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Despite a loss to the Cubs in which Jon Niese gave up nine hits and seven runs over seven innings of work, the Mets head into the All-Star break with a positive first half of the season behind them.
snippet: Despite a loss to the Cubs in which Jon Niese gave up nine hits and seven runs over seven innings of work, the Mets head into the All-Star break with a positive first half of the season behind them.
